management.name: SRI. CH. MALLA REDDY
management.description: Our college is a beacon of knowledge, fostering an environment that encourages growth and intellectual curiosity. Together, we strive to nurture a community that values academic excellence, innovation, and inclusivity.

management.name: SRI. CH. MAHENDER REDDY
management.description: Mr. Mahender Reddy carries forward the pioneering legacy of his visionary father. A multifaceted personality, he redefines the etiquette of quality education with an indomitable team spirit. He serves as a sustainable source of inspiration, fostering innovative thoughts and worthy practices to prepare potential professionals.

management.name: DR. CH. BHADRA REDDY
management.description: As President of MRGI and a medical professional, Dr. Reddy is committed to providing quality education in a conducive environment. He focuses on preparing students for evolving industry demands, ensuring they acquire the knowledge, skills, and mindset necessary to thrive in a dynamic and competitive world.

management.name: SMT. CH. SHALINI REDDY
management.description: A highly accomplished leader with an MBA, Smt. Shalini Reddy emphasizes academic excellence, critical thinking, and entrepreneurial skills. Her forward-thinking approach and dynamic leadership inspire a culture of innovation, excellence, and holistic development, preparing students for future leadership roles.

management.name: DR. CH. PREETI REDDY
management.description: Dr. Preeti Reddy is a dynamic leader dedicated to advancing healthcare and education standards. With a Gold Medal in General Medicine, she drives organizational growth and fosters a culture of high standards. As Vice-Chairman of MRV, she is committed to excellence and innovation in the medical field.

patrons.name: Dr.M ASHOK
patrons.description: Leading the academic vision and strategic growth of the institution.

patrons.name: Dr.Anatha Raman G. R
patrons.description: Providing guidance and support for departmental excellence and student initiatives.

patrons.name: Mr. R. Venkatesh
patrons.description: Serving as the primary liaison between the club and the academic administration.
